title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model—threads, code highlighting, PDF uploads, RAG.

title: llama-cpp-python with Ollama example
summary: Example showing how to run GGUF models via llama-cpp-python behind an Ollama-compatible REST server.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community npm package exposing the Ollama REST API as a global CLI with prompts and repl.

title: chainlit-ollama integration example
summary: Build a ChatGPT-like UI in minutes by pointing Chainlit at your local Ollama endpoint.

title: ollama-rag (npm package)
summary: Lightweight npm library for retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings + vector DB.

title: ollama-copilot (vscode extension)
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: Ollama Reddit community launch
summary: Official subreddit for Ollama announcements, model requests and troubleshooting.

title: HackerNews: Show HN: Ollama – Run Llama 2 locally with GPU
summary: Launch discussion covering performance, macOS Metal speed-ups and roadmap.

title: discord-ai-bot (Ollama backend)
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that proxies and extends the Ollama API with auth and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Minimal Streamlit app for chatting with any local Ollama model in under 50 lines.

title: Ollama on Home-Assistant (community add-on)
summary: Home Assistant add-on giving you a local LLM service for automations and voice assistants.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to pull and cache Ollama models inside your pipelines.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable services and decorators for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust client crate for Ollama with tokio and streaming support.
